text: Could we solve this problem? Create AI that empowers us rather than disempowering? This is the same type of question such as... Can we build a nuclear reactor that is safe? Can we create social media that is beneficial to its user's Health? Can we create a government and rule of law that is just? My answer to all these questions is, Yes! It is possible! But, it is not what happens by default!
author: Connor Leahy
author_description: Hacker - CEO @ConjectureAI - Ex-Head of @AiEleuther - "I don't know how to save the world, but dammit I'm gonna try."
